cab.content: This document is the property of His Britannic Majesty's Government. fan f JtSECRET.THE CABINET.Amendment to the Memorandum on the future organization of the Territorial Force by the Secretary of State for War, dated 29th December, 1919.The table on page 23 of the above Memorandum should read as follows- Number. Cost. .Army Reserve Special Reserve ...... Territorial Force Total 130,000 63,000 260,000 2,470,000 2,770,000 8,590,000 453,000 13,830,000H(B/20591) 100 1/20 HAS 7840wo
